mapper.select: SELECT RC.drc_innb , RCC.drcc_innb , drcci_innb , drcc_c_code , drcc_c_code_nm , drcci_c_code_nm , drcci_c_desc , ifnull(drcci_state,0) drcci_state , (select count(drcci_innb) from tb_diary_rnd_cvs_check_item A WHERE A.drcc_innb = RCC.drcc_innb ) child_cnt FROM tb_diary_rnd_cvs RC LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_diary_rnd_cvs_check RCC ON RC.drc_innb = RCC.drc_innb AND RCC.delete_at = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_diary_rnd_cvs_check_item RCCI ON RCC.drc_innb= RCCI.drc_innb AND RCC.drcc_innb = RCCI.drcc_innb AND RCCI.delete_at = 'N' WHERE RC.drc_innb = #{drc_innb} AND RC.delete_at = 'N'
